author: adc
msg: ActiveMQ seems to only make a SNAPSHOT.

author: gdamour
msg: Refactoring to use geronimo-sandbox-messaging as the mean to
implement the remote part of the GFileManager service.

author: gdamour
msg: Repackaging and refactoring of the inter-node message passing
framework previously under the sandbox/webdav sub-project.
o this new version uses geronimo-network as the transport layer;
o a primitive reference layer has been introduced: objects/services
implementing the Referenceable mark-up interface can be passed
around between Nodes and invokes remotely; and
o the MetaConnection idea has been replaced by a
RemoteNodeManager: a Node contains now a RemoteNodeManager,
which manages (join, leave and listen to) RemoteNodes.
This commit was manufactured by cvs2svn to create tag 'v1_0_M1'.
